metadata.synopsis: Default dialog for RetiredFist_Elf01 in the Retired Fists vignette in the LOW Park situation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Elf Retired Fist in the lower city Park in BGO_Main_A at coords -150, 30, -5

0.speaker: Eldaernth
0.text: Damn shame to see all this violence. I'd hoped that was all behind me.

1.speaker: Eldaernth
1.text: Don't listen to Vistra. She talks big for a short, old dwarf - those 'good ol' days' weren't all rosy.

2.speaker: Eldaernth
2.text: I reckon the current cohorts doing the best they can, given... y'know. Circumstances.
